## Yoot.map() method

Applies custom transformations to the current state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
map(fn: (state: YootState) => YootState): Yoot;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fn

</td><td>

(state: [YootState](./yoot.yootstate.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; <span style="opacity:0.7;font-style:italic">YootState</span>

</td><td>

Function `(state: YootState) => SomeYootState` to modify state.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Yoot](./yoot.yoot.md)

## Remarks

The callback receives a mutable copy of the current state.

## Example

```ts
yoot()
  .src('https://cdn.example.com/images/image-1.png')
  .width(100)
  .map((state) => {
    state.alt ||= 'Fallback Alt Text';
    state.directives.format = 'webp';
    return state;
  }).url;
```
